position: Senior Engineer - Back End Process Development
name: Pragmatic
description: Pragmatic is seeking a Senior Back End Process Development Engineer to lead the development of wafer and die processes, streamline high-volume processes with existing and new equipment, and ensure successful transitions to operations. This full-time position in North East England offers a competitive benefits package and possible visa/relocation support. Ideal candidates will have a bachelor's degree (or equivalent experience), proficiency in back-end wafer processes and laser processing, a solid understanding of data analysis techniques, and excellent communication, collaborative, and leadership skills.
